Posts.EditableText: I found a game I want to play, but want to play it on mobile. I know all the steps required to do so (via the QuestJS - PhoneGap method). But QuestJS online has disappeared, and the latest release of JS on github is apparently not compatible with the game I'm trying to play for some reason. I've been headscratching for awhile now and realized I had to come to the forums eventually.
